mapper.sql: t.id, t.user_id, t.order_no, t.request_params, t.order_string, t.add_time
mapper.delete: delete from alipay_order_log where 1=1 and id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into alipay_order_log ( user_id, order_no, request_params, order_string, add_time ) values( #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestParams,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{orderString,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update alipay_order_log set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_params = #{requestParams,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, order_string = #{orderString,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where 1=1 and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
